name: CUSTOM Before / After #4
liquid_code:
<link
  rel="stylesheet"
  href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/swiper@11/swiper-bundle.min.css"
/>

{%- liquid 
  assign padding_horizontal = section.settings.padding_horizontal
  assign padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign padding_top = section.settings.padding_top
  assign padding_bottom = section.settings.padding_bottom
  assign border_color = section.settings.border_color
  assign border_thickness = section.settings.border_thickness
  assign margin_top = section.settings.margin_top
  assign margin_bottom = section.settings.margin_bottom
  assign background_color = section.settings.background_color
  assign background_gradient = section.settings.background_gradient
  assign full_width = section.settings.full_width
  assign content_width = section.settings.content_width
  assign lazy = section.settings.lazy

  assign heading = section.settings.heading
  assign heading_size = section.settings.heading_size
  assign heading_size_mobile = section.settings.heading_size_mobile
  assign heading_color = section.settings.heading_color
  assign heading_custom = section.settings.heading_custom
  assign heading_font = section.settings.heading_font
  assign heading_height = section.settings.heading_height
  assign heading_align = section.settings.heading_align
  assign heading_align_mobile = section.settings.heading_align_mobile

  assign body_gap_mobile = section.settings.body_gap_mobile
  assign body_gap = section.settings.body_gap
  assign body_mt_mobile = section.settings.body_mt_mobile
  assign body_mt = section.settings.body_mt

  assign image_radius = section.settings.image_radius
  assign image_border_thickness = section.settings.image_border_thickness
  assign image_border_color = section.settings.image_border_color
  assign image_ratio = section.settings.image_ratio
  assign image_ratio_mobile = section.settings.image_ratio_mobile
  assign image_shadow = section.settings.image_shadow
  assign image_padding = section.settings.image_padding
  assign image_padding_mobile = section.settings.image_padding_mobile
  assign image_bg_color = section.settings.image_bg_color

  assign text_to = section.settings.text_to
  assign text_from = section.settings.text_from
  assign before_after_text_size = section.settings.before_after_text_size
  assign before_after_text_size_mobile = section.settings.before_after_text_size_mobile
  assign before_text_color = section.settings.before_text_color
  assign after_text_color = section.settings.after_text_color
  assign before_after_text_custom = section.settings.before_after_text_custom
  assign before_after_text_font = section.settings.before_after_text_font
  assign before_after_text_height = section.settings.before_after_text_height

  assign slide_heading_size = section.settings.slide_heading_size
  assign slide_heading_size_mobile = section.settings.slide_heading_size_mobile
  assign slide_heading_color = section.settings.slide_heading_color
  assign slide_heading_custom = section.settings.slide_heading_custom
  assign slide_heading_font = section.settings.slide_heading_font
  assign slide_heading_height = section.settings.slide_heading_height
  assign slide_heading_align = section.settings.slide_heading_align
  assign slide_heading_align_mobile = section.settings.slide_heading_align_mobile

  assign stars_icon = section.settings.stars_icon
  assign stars_size = section.settings.stars_size
  assign stars_color = section.settings.stars_color
  assign stars_align_mobile = section.settings.stars_align_mobile
  assign stars_align = section.settings.stars_align
  assign stars_mt = section.settings.stars_mt

  assign slide_text_size = section.settings.slide_text_size
  assign slide_text_size_mobile = section.settings.slide_text_size_mobile
  assign slide_text_color = section.settings.slide_text_color
  assign slide_text_custom = section.settings.slide_text_custom
  assign slide_text_font = section.settings.slide_text_font
  assign slide_text_height = section.settings.slide_text_height
  assign slide_text_align = section.settings.slide_text_align
  assign slide_text_align_mobile = section.settings.slide_text_align_mobile
  assign slide_text_mt = section.settings.slide_text_mt

  assign navigation_align_mobile = section.settings.navigation_align_mobile
  assign navigation_align = section.settings.navigation_align
  assign navigation_mt = section.settings.navigation_mt
  assign navigation_mt_mobile = section.settings.navigation_mt_mobile
  assign navigation_gap = section.settings.navigation_gap
  assign navigation_position_mobile = section.settings.navigation_position_mobile

  assign arrow_left = section.settings.arrow_left
  assign arrow_right = section.settings.arrow_right
  assign arrow_size = section.settings.arrow_size
  assign arrow_size_mobile = section.settings.arrow_size_mobile
  assign arrow_color = section.settings.arrow_color
  assign arrow_hover_color = section.settings.arrow_hover_color
  assign arrow_show_desktop = section.settings.arrow_show_desktop
  assign arrow_show_mobile = section.settings.arrow_show_mobile

  assign pagination_size = section.settings.pagination_size
  assign pagination_size_mobile = section.settings.pagination_size_mobile
  assign pagination_color = section.settings.pagination_color
  assign pagination_custom = section.settings.pagination_custom
  assign pagination_font = section.settings.pagination_font
  assign pagination_height = section.settings.pagination_height
  
-%}

{%- style -%}

  {{  heading_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{  before_after_text_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{  slide_heading_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{  slide_text_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{  pagination_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  
  .section-{{ section.id }} {
    border-top: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    border-bottom: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    margin-top: {{ margin_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    overflow: hidden;
  }
  
  .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding-top: {{ padding_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
  }

  .before-after-heading-{{ section.id }} {
    text-align: {{ heading_align_mobile }};
  }

  .before-after-heading-{{ section.id }} * {
    margin: 0;
    font-size: {{ heading_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ heading_color }};
    line-height: {{ heading_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
  }

  .before-after-body-{{ section.id }} {
    margin-top: {{ body_mt_mobile }}px;
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: repeat(1, 1fr);
    gap: {{ body_gap_mobile }}px;
    align-items: center;
  }

  .before-after-images-{{ section.id }} {
    position: relative;
    padding-left: 17px;
    padding-right: 5px;
  }

  .before-after-item-{{ section.id }} {
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
  }

  .before-after-item-{{ section.id }}.active {
    position: static !important;
  }

  .before-after-left-{{ section.id }},
  .before-after-right-{{ section.id }} {
    opacity: 0;
  }

  .before-after-item-{{ section.id }}.active .before-after-left-{{ section.id }} {
    opacity: 1;
    transform: rotate(-4.462deg);
    transition: all 1s ease;
  }

  .before-after-item-{{ section.id }}.active .before-after-right-{{ section.id }} {
    opacity: 1;
    transform: rotate(5.485deg);
    transition: all 1s ease;
  }

  .before-after-left-image-{{ section.id }},
  .before-after-right-image-{{ section.id }} {
    overflow: hidden;
    border-radius: {{ image_radius }}px;
    border: {{ image_border_thickness }}px solid {{ image_border_color }};
    position: relative;
    z-index: 1;
    padding: {{ image_padding_mobile }}px;
    background-color: {{ image_bg_color }};
  }

  .before-after-left-image-{{ section.id }} img,
  .before-after-left-image-{{ section.id }} svg,
  .before-after-right-image-{{ section.id }} img,
  .before-after-right-image-{{ section.id }} svg {
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    object-fit: cover;
    border-radius: {{ image_radius }}px;
  }

  .before-after-left-image-{{ section.id }} svg,
  .before-after-right-image-{{ section.id }} svg {
    background-color: #AFAFAF;
  }

  .before-after-text-wrapper-{{ section.id }} {
    width: 100%;
    padding-top: 60px;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 20px;
  }

  .before-after-text-{{ section.id }} {
    flex-shrink: 0;
    margin: 0;
    font-size: {{ before_after_text_size_mobile }}px;
    line-height: {{ before_after_text_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
  }

  .before-after-left-{{ section.id }} .before-after-text-{{ section.id }} {
    color: {{ after_text_color }};
  }

  .before-after-right-{{ section.id }} .before-after-text-{{ section.id }} {
    color: {{ before_text_color }};
  }

  .before-after-arrow-{{ section.id }} {
    flex: 0 0 50px;
    position: relative;
    z-index: 2;
  }

  .before-after-left-{{ section.id }} .before-after-text-wrapper-{{ section.id }} {
    transform: translateX(-{{ before_after_text_size_mobile }}px);
  }

  .before-after-arrow-{{ section.id }} svg {
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    object-fit: cover;
  }

  .before-after-left-{{ section.id }} .before-after-arrow-{{ section.id }} svg {
    transform: rotate(135deg);
  }

  .before-after-right-{{ section.id }} .before-after-arrow-{{ section.id }} svg {
    transform: rotate(-45deg);
  }

  .before-after-left-{{ section.id }} .before-after-arrow-{{ section.id }} svg path {
    fill: {{ after_text_color }} !important;
  }

   .before-after-right-{{ section.id }} .before-after-arrow-{{ section.id }} svg path {
    fill: {{ before_text_color }} !important;
  }

  .before-after-right-image-{{ section.id }} {
    margin-top: 60px;
  }

  .before-after-slide-heading-{{ section.id }} {
    text-align: {{ slide_heading_align_mobile }};
  }

  .before-after-slide-heading-{{ section.id }} * {
    margin: 0;
    font-size: {{ slide_heading_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ slide_heading_color }};
    line-height: {{ slide_heading_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
  }

  .before-after-stars-{{ section.id }} {
    margin-top: {{ stars_mt | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: {{ stars_align_mobile }};
    gap: 5px;
  }

  .before-after-stars-{{ section.id }} svg,
  .before-after-stars-{{ section.id }} img {
    display: block;
    width: {{ stars_size }}px;
    height: {{ stars_size }}px;
    object-fit: cover;
  }

  .before-after-slide-text-{{ section.id }} {
    margin-top: {{ slide_text_mt | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    text-align: {{ slide_text_align_mobile }};
  }

  .before-after-slide-text-{{ section.id }} * {
    margin: 0;
    font-size: {{ slide_text_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ slide_text_color }};
    line-height: {{ slide_text_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
  }

  .before-after-navigation-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    gap: {{ navigation_gap | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    margin-top: {{ navigation_mt_mobile }}px;
    justify-content: {{ navigation_align_mobile }};
  }

  .before-after-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
  .before-after-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
    position: static !important;
    flex: 0 0 {{ arrow_size_mobile }}px;
    background: transparent;
    transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
    cursor: pointer;
    -webkit-appearance: none;
    border: 0px;
    box-shadow: none;
    padding: 0px;
  }

  .before-after-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} svg,
  .before-after-btn-next-{{ section.id }} svg,
  .before-after-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} img,
  .before-after-btn-next-{{ section.id }} img {
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    object-fit: cover;
    display: block;
  }

  .before-after-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} svg path,
  .before-after-btn-next-{{ section.id }} svg path {
    fill: {{ arrow_color }};
    transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
  }

  .before-after-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover svg path,
  .before-after-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover svg path {
    fill: {{ arrow_hover_color }};
    transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
  }

  .before-after-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}.swiper-button-disabled,
  .before-after-btn-next-{{ section.id }}.swiper-button-disabled {
    opacity: 0.3;
  }

  .before-after-pagination-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 5px;
  }

  .before-after-pagination-{{ section.id }},
  .before-after-pagination-{{ section.id }} * {
    margin: 0;
    font-size: {{ pagination_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ pagination_color }};
    line-height: {{ pagination_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
    font-weight: 700;
  }

  .before-after-slider-wrapper-{{ section.id }} {
    display: grid;
  }

  .before-after-slider-inner-{{ section.id }} {
    min-width: 0px;
  }
  
  @media(min-width: 1024px) {

    .section-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ margin_top }}px;
      margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom }}px;
    }
    
    .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
      padding: 0 5rem;
      padding-top: {{ padding_top }}px;
      padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom }}px;
      padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem;
      padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem;
    }

    .before-after-heading-{{ section.id }} {
      text-align: {{ heading_align }};
    }

    .before-after-heading-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-size: {{ heading_size }}px;
    }

    .before-after-body-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ body_mt }}px;
      grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);
      gap: {{ body_gap }}px;
    }

    .before-after-images-{{ section.id }} {
      padding: 0px;
    }

    .before-after-left-image-{{ section.id }},
    .before-after-right-image-{{ section.id }} {
      padding: {{ image_padding }}px;
    }

    .before-after-left-{{ section.id }} .before-after-text-wrapper-{{ section.id }} {
      transform: translateX(-0px);
    }

    .before-after-text-{{ section.id }} {
      font-size: {{ before_after_text_size }}px;
    }

    .before-after-slide-heading-{{ section.id }} {
      text-align: {{ slide_heading_align }};
    }

    .before-after-slide-heading-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-size: {{ slide_heading_size}}px;
    }

    .before-after-stars-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ stars_mt }}px;
      justify-content: {{ stars_align }};
    }

    .before-after-slide-text-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ slide_text_mt }}px;
      text-align: {{ slide_text_align }};
    }

    .before-after-slide-text-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-size: {{ slide_text_size}}px;
    }

    .before-after-navigation-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ navigation_mt }}px;
      justify-content: {{ navigation_align }};
      gap: {{ navigation_gap }}px;
    }

    .before-after-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
    .before-after-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
      flex: 0 0 {{ arrow_size }}px;
    }

    .before-after-pagination-{{ section.id }},
    .before-after-pagination-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-size: {{ pagination_size }}px;
    }

    .before-after-arrow-{{ section.id }} {
      flex: 0 0 90px;
    }
    
  }
  
{%- endstyle -%}

{% unless full_width %}
  <style>
    .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
      max-width: {{ content_width }}rem;
    }
  </style>
{% endunless %}

{% if heading_custom %}
  <style>
    .before-after-heading-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-family: {{ heading_font.family }}, {{ heading_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ heading_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ heading_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if before_after_text_custom %}
  <style>
    .before-after-text-{{ section.id }} {
      font-family: {{ before_after_text_font.family }}, {{ before_after_text_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ before_after_text_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ before_after_text_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if slide_heading_custom %}
  <style>
    .before-after-slide-heading-{{ section.id }} *  {
      font-family: {{ slide_heading_font.family }}, {{ slide_heading_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ slide_heading_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ slide_heading_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if slide_text_custom %}
  <style>
    .before-after-slide-text-{{ section.id }} *  {
      font-family: {{ slide_text_font.family }}, {{ slide_text_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ slide_text_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ slide_text_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if pagination_custom %}
  <style>
    .before-after-pagination-{{ section.id }},
    .before-after-pagination-{{ section.id }} *  {
      font-family: {{ pagination_font.family }}, {{ pagination_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ pagination_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ pagination_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if image_ratio_mobile == "portrait" %}
  <style>
    .before-after-left-image-{{ section.id }},
    .before-after-right-image-{{ section.id }} {
     aspect-ratio: 9.6/12; 
    }
  </style>
{% elsif image_ratio_mobile == "landscape" %}
  <style>
    .before-after-left-image-{{ section.id }},
    .before-after-right-image-{{ section.id }}{
     aspect-ratio: 12/9; 
    }
  </style>
{% elsif image_ratio_mobile == "square" %}
  <style>
    .before-after-left-image-{{ section.id }},
    .before-after-right-image-{{ section.id }} {
     aspect-ratio: 12/12; 
    }
  </style>
{% else%}
  <style>
    .before-after-left-image-{{ section.id }},
    .before-after-right-image-{{ section.id }} {
     aspect-ratio: auto; 
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if image_ratio == "portrait" %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
     .before-after-left-image-{{ section.id }},
      .before-after-right-image-{{ section.id }} {
       aspect-ratio: 9.6/12; 
      } 
    }
  </style>
{% elsif image_ratio == "landscape" %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .before-after-left-image-{{ section.id }},
      .before-after-right-image-{{ section.id }} {
       aspect-ratio: 12/9; 
      }
    }
  </style>
{% elsif image_ratio == "square" %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .before-after-left-image-{{ section.id }},
      .before-after-right-image-{{ section.id }} {
       aspect-ratio: 12/12; 
      }
    }
  </style>
{% else%}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .before-after-left-image-{{ section.id }},
      .before-after-right-image-{{ section.id }} {
       aspect-ratio: auto; 
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if arrow_show_mobile %}
  <style>
    .before-after-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
    .before-after-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
      display: flex;
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    .before-after-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
    .before-after-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
      display: none;
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if arrow_show_desktop %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .before-after-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
      .before-after-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
        display: flex;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .before-after-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
      .before-after-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
        display: none;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if image_shadow %}
  <style>
    .before-after-left-image-{{ section.id }},
    .before-after-right-image-{{ section.id }} {
      box-shadow: 0 4px 9px #00000040;
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if navigation_position_mobile == "top" %}
  <style>
    .before-after-slider-inner-{{ section.id }} {
      order: 2;
    }

    .before-after-navigation-{{ section.id }} {
      order: 1;
      margin-top: 0px;
      margin-bottom: {{ navigation_mt_mobile }}px;
    }

    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .before-after-slider-inner-{{ section.id }} {
        order: 1;
      }
  
      .before-after-navigation-{{ section.id }} {
        order: 2;
        margin-top: {{ navigation_mt }}px;
        margin-bottom: 0px;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

<div class="section-{{ section.id }} before-after-{{ section.id }}" style="background-color:{{ background_color }}; background-image: {{ background_gradient }};">
    <div class="section-{{ section.id }}-settings">
      {% if heading != blank %}
        <div class="before-after-heading-{{ section.id }}">
          {{ heading }}
        </div>
      {% endif %}

      <div class="before-after-body-{{ section.id }}">
        <div class="before-after-images-{{ section.id }}">
          {% for block in section.blocks %}
            <div class="before-after-item-{{ section.id }} {% if forloop.first %}active{% endif %}" data-id="{{ block.id }}">
              <div class="before-after-left-{{ section.id }}">
                <div class="before-after-left-image-{{ section.id }}">
                  {% if block.settings.before_image != blank %}
                    <img src="{{ block.settings.before_image | image_url }}" alt="{{ block.settings.before_image.alt }}" {% if lazy %}loading="lazy"{% endif %}>
                  {% else %}
                    {{ 'image' | placeholder_svg_tag }}
                  {% endif %}
                </div>
                <div class="before-after-text-wrapper-{{ section.id }}">
                  <p class="before-after-text-{{ section.id }}">{{ text_to }}</p>
                  <div class="before-after-arrow-{{ section.id }}">
                    <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" version="1.1" width="256" height="256" viewBox="0 0 256 256" xml:space="preserve">
                      <g style="stroke: none; stroke-width: 0; stroke-dasharray: none; stroke-linecap: butt; stroke-linejoin: miter; stroke-miterlimit: 10; fill: none; fill-rule: nonzero; opacity: 1;" transform="translate(1.4065934065934016 1.4065934065934016) scale(2.81 2.81)" >
                      	<path d="M 5.873 12.409 l 8.53 4.925 l 8.53 4.925 c 0.914 0.528 2.056 -0.132 2.056 -1.187 l 0 -6.207 c 13.935 1.705 24.766 13.603 24.766 27.991 l 0 12.12 c 0 18.8 14.876 34.192 33.475 35.023 c 0.859 0.038 1.583 -0.632 1.583 -1.491 v -3.871 c 0 -0.785 -0.608 -1.448 -1.391 -1.486 C 68.51 82.423 56.603 70.063 56.603 54.976 l 0 -12.12 c 0 -18.17 -13.894 -33.152 -31.615 -34.887 l 0 -6.595 c 0 -1.055 -1.142 -1.714 -2.056 -1.187 l -8.53 4.925 l -8.53 4.925 C 4.959 10.562 4.959 11.881 5.873 12.409 z" style="stroke: none; stroke-width: 1; stroke-dasharray: none; stroke-linecap: butt; stroke-linejoin: miter; stroke-miterlimit: 10; fill: rgb(0,0,0); fill-rule: nonzero; opacity: 1;" transform=" matrix(1 0 0 1 0 0) " stroke-linecap="round" />
                      </g>
                    </svg>
                  </div>
                </div>
              </div>
              <div class="before-after-right-{{ section.id }}">
                <div class="before-after-text-wrapper-{{ section.id }}">
                  <div class="before-after-arrow-{{ section.id }}">
                    <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" version="1.1" width="256" height="256" viewBox="0 0 256 256" xml:space="preserve">
                      <g style="stroke: none; stroke-width: 0; stroke-dasharray: none; stroke-linecap: butt; stroke-linejoin: miter; stroke-miterlimit: 10; fill: none; fill-rule: nonzero; opacity: 1;" transform="translate(1.4065934065934016 1.4065934065934016) scale(2.81 2.81)" >
                      	<path d="M 5.873 12.409 l 8.53 4.925 l 8.53 4.925 c 0.914 0.528 2.056 -0.132 2.056 -1.187 l 0 -6.207 c 13.935 1.705 24.766 13.603 24.766 27.991 l 0 12.12 c 0 18.8 14.876 34.192 33.475 35.023 c 0.859 0.038 1.583 -0.632 1.583 -1.491 v -3.871 c 0 -0.785 -0.608 -1.448 -1.391 -1.486 C 68.51 82.423 56.603 70.063 56.603 54.976 l 0 -12.12 c 0 -18.17 -13.894 -33.152 -31.615 -34.887 l 0 -6.595 c 0 -1.055 -1.142 -1.714 -2.056 -1.187 l -8.53 4.925 l -8.53 4.925 C 4.959 10.562 4.959 11.881 5.873 12.409 z" style="stroke: none; stroke-width: 1; stroke-dasharray: none; stroke-linecap: butt; stroke-linejoin: miter; stroke-miterlimit: 10; fill: rgb(0,0,0); fill-rule: nonzero; opacity: 1;" transform=" matrix(1 0 0 1 0 0) " stroke-linecap="round" />
                      </g>
                    </svg>
                  </div>
                  <p class="before-after-text-{{ section.id }}">{{ text_from }}</p>
                </div>
                <div class="before-after-right-image-{{ section.id }}">
                  {% if block.settings.after_image != blank %}
                    <img src="{{ block.settings.after_image | image_url }}" alt="{{ block.settings.after_image.alt }}" {% if lazy %}loading="lazy"{% endif %}>
                  {% else %}
                    {{ 'image' | placeholder_svg_tag }}
                  {% endif %}
                </div>
              </div>
            </div>
          {% endfor %}
        </div>
        <div class="before-after-slider-wrapper-{{ section.id }}">
          <div class="before-after-slider-inner-{{ section.id }}">
            <div class="before-after-slider-{{ section.id }} swiper">
              <div class="swiper-wrapper">
                {% for block in section.blocks %}
                  <div class="before-after-slide-{{ section.id }} swiper-slide" id="{{ block.id }}">
                      {% if block.settings.heading != blank %}
                        <div class="before-after-slide-heading-{{ section.id }}">
                          {{ block.settings.heading }}
                        </div>
                      {% endif %}
    
                      {% if block.settings.stars_count != 0 %}
                        <div class="before-after-stars-{{ section.id }}">
                          {% if stars_icon != blank %}
                            {% for item in (1..block.settings.stars_count) %}
                              <img src="{{ stars_icon | image_url }}" alt="{{ stars_icon.alt }}" {% if lazy %}loading="lazy"{% endif %}>
                            {% endfor %}
                          {% else %}
                            <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="19" viewBox="0 0 20 19" fill="none">
                              {% if block.settings.stars_count > 0 and block.settings.stars_count < 1  %}
                                <defs>
                                  <linearGradient id="grad{{ section.id }}1">
                                    <stop offset="0%" stop-color="{{ stars_color }}" />
                                    <stop offset="50%" stop-color="{{ stars_color }}" />
                                    <stop offset="50%" stop-color="white" />
                                    <stop offset="100%" stop-color="white" />
                                  </linearGradient>
                                </defs>
                              {% endif %}
                              <path {% if block.settings.stars_count > 0 and block.settings.stars_count < 1 %}stroke="{{ stars_color }}"{% endif %} d="M10 0L12.9389 5.95492L19.5106 6.90983L14.7553 11.5451L15.8779 18.0902L10 15L4.12215 18.0902L5.24472 11.5451L0.489435 6.90983L7.06107 5.95492L10 0Z" fill="{% if block.settings.stars_count > 0 and block.settings.stars_count < 1 %}url(#grad{{ section.id }}1){% elsif block.settings.stars_count > 0.5 %}{{ stars_color }}{% endif %}"></path>
                            </svg>
                            <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="19" viewBox="0 0 20 19" fill="none">
                              {% if block.settings.stars_count > 1 and block.settings.stars_count < 2  %}
                                <defs>
                                  <linearGradient id="grad{{ section.id }}2">
                                    <stop offset="0%" stop-color="{{ stars_color }}" />
                                    <stop offset="50%" stop-color="{{ stars_color }}" />
                                    <stop offset="50%" stop-color="white" />
                                    <stop offset="100%" stop-color="white" />
                                  </linearGradient>
                                </defs>
                              {% endif %}
                              <path {% if block.settings.stars_count > 1 and block.settings.stars_count < 2 %}stroke="{{ stars_color }}"{% endif %} d="M10 0L12.9389 5.95492L19.5106 6.90983L14.7553 11.5451L15.8779 18.0902L10 15L4.12215 18.0902L5.24472 11.5451L0.489435 6.90983L7.06107 5.95492L10 0Z" fill="{% if block.settings.stars_count > 1 and block.settings.stars_count < 2 %}url(#grad{{ section.id }}2){% elsif block.settings.stars_count > 1.5 %}{{ stars_color }}{% endif %}"></path>
                            </svg>
                            <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="19" viewBox="0 0 20 19" fill="none">
                              {% if block.settings.stars_count > 2 and block.settings.stars_count < 3  %}
                                <defs>
                                  <linearGradient id="grad{{ section.id }}3">
                                    <stop offset="0%" stop-color="{{ stars_color }}" />
                                    <stop offset="50%" stop-color="{{ stars_color }}" />
                                    <stop offset="50%" stop-color="white" />
                                    <stop offset="100%" stop-color="white" />
                                  </linearGradient>
                                </defs>
                              {% endif %}
                              <path {% if block.settings.stars_count > 2 and block.settings.stars_count < 3 %}stroke="{{ stars_color }}"{% endif %} d="M10 0L12.9389 5.95492L19.5106 6.90983L14.7553 11.5451L15.8779 18.0902L10 15L4.12215 18.0902L5.24472 11.5451L0.489435 6.90983L7.06107 5.95492L10 0Z" fill="{% if block.settings.stars_count > 2 and block.settings.stars_count < 3 %}url(#grad{{ section.id }}3){% elsif block.settings.stars_count > 2.5 %}{{ stars_color }}{% endif %}"></path>
                            </svg>
                            <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="19" viewBox="0 0 20 19" fill="none">
                              {% if block.settings.stars_count > 3 and block.settings.stars_count < 4  %}
                                <defs>
                                  <linearGradient id="grad{{ section.id }}4">
                                    <stop offset="0%" stop-color="{{ stars_color }}" />
                                    <stop offset="50%" stop-color="{{ stars_color }}" />
                                    <stop offset="50%" stop-color="white" />
                                    <stop offset="100%" stop-color="white" />
                                  </linearGradient>
                                </defs>
                              {% endif %}
                              <path {% if block.settings.stars_count > 3 and block.settings.stars_count < 4  %}stroke="{{ stars_color }}"{% endif %} d="M10 0L12.9389 5.95492L19.5106 6.90983L14.7553 11.5451L15.8779 18.0902L10 15L4.12215 18.0902L5.24472 11.5451L0.489435 6.90983L7.06107 5.95492L10 0Z" fill="{% if block.settings.stars_count > 3 and block.settings.stars_count < 4  %}url(#grad{{ section.id }}4){% elsif block.settings.stars_count > 3.5 %}{{ stars_color }}{% endif %}"></path>
                            </svg>
                            <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="19" viewBox="0 0 20 19" fill="none">
                              {% if block.settings.stars_count > 4 and block.settings.stars_count < 5  %}
                                <defs>
                                  <linearGradient id="grad{{ section.id }}5">
                                    <stop offset="0%" stop-color="{{ stars_color }}" />
                                    <stop offset="50%" stop-color="{{ stars_color }}" />
                                    <stop offset="50%" stop-color="white" />
                                    <stop offset="100%" stop-color="white" />
                                  </linearGradient>
                                </defs>
                              {% endif %}
                              <path {% if block.settings.stars_count > 4 and block.settings.stars_count < 5  %}stroke="{{ stars_color }}"{% endif %} d="M10 0L12.9389 5.95492L19.5106 6.90983L14.7553 11.5451L15.8779 18.0902L10 15L4.12215 18.0902L5.24472 11.5451L0.489435 6.90983L7.06107 5.95492L10 0Z" fill="{% if block.settings.stars_count > 4 and block.settings.stars_count < 5  %}url(#grad{{ section.id }}5){% elsif block.settings.stars_count > 4.5 %}{{ stars_color }}{% endif %}"></path>
                            </svg>
                          {% endif %}
                        </div>
                      {% endif %}
                                      
                      {% if block.settings.text != blank %}
                        <div class="before-after-slide-text-{{ section.id }}">
                          {{ block.settings.text }}
                        </div>
                      {% endif %}
    
                  </div>
                {% endfor %}
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
          <div class="before-after-navigation-{{ section.id }}">
              <button class="before-after-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}">
                {% if arrow_left != blank %}
                  <img src="{{ arrow_left | image_url }}" alt="{{ arrow_left.alt }}">
                {% else %}
                <svg width="92" height="38" viewBox="0 0 92 38" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" style="transform: rotate(-180deg);">
                  <path d="M72.472 0L71.063 1.409L87.303 17.649H0V19.643H87.3L71.06 35.883L72.469 37.293L91.115 18.646L72.472 0Z" fill="black"/>
                </svg>
                {% endif %}
              </button>
              <div class="before-after-pagination-{{ section.id }}">
                <p class="before-after-current-{{ section.id }}">1</p>
                /
                <p class="before-after-all-{{ section.id }}">{{ section.blocks.size }}</p>
              </div>
              <button class="before-after-btn-next-{{ section.id }}">
                {% if arrow_right != blank %}
                  <img src="{{ arrow_right | image_url }}" alt="{{ arrow_right.alt }}">
                {% else %}
                <svg width="92" height="38" viewBox="0 0 92 38" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
                  <path d="M72.472 0L71.063 1.409L87.303 17.649H0V19.643H87.3L71.06 35.883L72.469 37.293L91.115 18.646L72.472 0Z" fill="black"/>
                </svg>
                {% endif %}
              </button>
            </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
</div>

<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/swiper@11/swiper-bundle.min.js"></script>

<script>
  function initScrollingProducts() {
    const slider = new Swiper(".before-after-slider-{{ section.id }}", {
      speed: 400,
      spaceBetween: 20,
      navigation: {
        nextEl: '.before-after-btn-next-{{ section.id }}',
        prevEl: '.before-after-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}',
      },
    });

    slider.on('slideChange', () => {
        const currentSlideIndex = slider.realIndex;
        const totalSlides = slider.slides.length;
        const currentSlideId = slider.slides[currentSlideIndex].id;

        document.querySelector('.before-after-current-{{ section.id }}').textContent = currentSlideIndex + 1;
        document.querySelector('.before-after-all-{{ section.id }}').textContent = totalSlides;

        const slideItems = document.querySelectorAll('.before-after-item-{{ section.id }}');
        slideItems.forEach(item => {
            let dataId = item.getAttribute('data-id');
            if (dataId === currentSlideId) {
                item.classList.add('active');
            } else {
                item.classList.remove('active');
            }
        });
    });
  }

  document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', initScrollingProducts);
  
  if (Shopify.designMode) {
     document.addEventListener('shopify:section:unload', initScrollingProducts);
     document.addEventListener('shopify:section:load', initScrollingProducts);
  }
</script>

lazy.label: Lazy load
lazy.description: Lazy load images for speed optimisation
